name: BT4VT
tagline: Blacksburg Transit bus tracker with live map updates of all available routes
body: Blacksburg Transit bus tracker with live map updates for all the available Blacksburg Transit routes. Favorite stops and receive notifications when you are at your favorited stops. Get departure times for any stop. See where the bus is and how many passengers are on it. Not affiliated with Blacksburg Transit. To join the beta group visit https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.bt4vt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
